channel.title: Stream US vids outside of US without proxy's
channel.description:
I wrote this page over a year ago but I believe it still works on a few sites.
http://3hit.net/stream_outside_us/

item.title: Stream US vids outside of US without proxy's
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

BloodRayne:

Unfortunately this doesn’t work for most of the major sites anymore. But if you’re outside of the U.S., just use a free vpn like Hotspotshield to mask yourself. Hotspotshield works for U.S. based sites, if you’re in the U.S. looking to watch E4 shows online or something, just search for something similar but based in Europe.

Yes well the guide was really for those who don’t want to use a vpn/proxy.

I will also check it out further as i’m sure there are other methods that can run these sites without a proxy. At the time I wrote the page it worked on mtv so not sure if it still does.

Read full topic
item.source: Stream US vids outside of US without proxy's
